change_plan.q: Can I change my plan at any time?
change_plan.a: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

hidden_fees.a: No hidden fees! The displayed price is all-inclusive. No setup fees, no commission on sales.

cancel.q: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
cancel.a: You keep access until the end of your billing period. Your data is kept for 30 days.
